title: Everyone Thinks My Brother Is A Hero...
itunes:title: Everyone Thinks My Brother Is A Hero...

description:
If you only knew...

***

Content warning: Suicide/self harm, Child Abuse, Animal Abuse, Animal Death, Spiders, Torture

***

Written by Christian Wallace and narrated by Cole Burkhardt

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
